name: DENTAL SERVICES
innerText: Dental care is the maintenance of healthy teeth and may refer to: Oral hygiene, the practice of keeping the mouth and teeth

name: IMPLANTS
innerText: A dental implant is a metal post that replaces the root portion of a missing tooth. tooth (crown) is placed on an extension.

name: DENTISTRY
innerText: Dentistry, the profession concerned with the prevention and treatment of oral disease including diseases of the teeth structures

name: DENTAL BRIDGES
innerText: A bridge is made up of two or more crowns for the teeth on either side of the gap -- teeth are called abutment teeth

name: CROWNS
innerText: Dental crowns are tooth-shaped “caps” that can be placed over your tooth. The crown restores the tooth's, strength and appearance.

name: INVISALIGN
innerText: Dental crowns are tooth-shaped “caps” that can be placed over your tooth. The crown restores the tooth's, strength and appearance.

name: VENEERS
innerText: The Invisalign system uses clear aligner trays to move your teeth into place over a period of time. The trays are made smooth.

name: TEETH WHITENING
innerText: Teeth whitening is a simple process. Whitening products contain one of two tooth bleaches (hydrogen peroxide or carbamide peroxide).
